title: The Fad diet circus
brief_description: Shows the potential hazards of fad diets, which seldom result in long-term weight loss. Compares two groups of dieters, one on a well balanced diet and the other on a low carbohydrate diet. Shows how both groups lose weight but the low carbohydrate group experiences medical problems.
